trans-unit.source: Provides configuration system support for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_appSettings" name="appSettings" href=""></xref> configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 提供的配置系统支持<xref uid="langword_csharp_appSettings" name="appSettings" href=""></xref>配置节。

trans-unit.source: The `appSettings` configuration section provides for key/value pairs of `string` values for an application.
trans-unit.target: `appSettings`配置部分提供的键/值对`string`应用程序的值。

trans-unit.source: Rather than accessing these values by using an instance of an AppSettingsSection object, you should use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.AppSettings%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager> class or the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager.AppSettings%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用 AppSettingsSection 对象的实例访问这些值，应使用<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.AppSettings%2A>属性的<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager>类或<xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager.AppSettings%2A>属性的<xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager>类。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebConfigurationManager.AppSettings%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.AppSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.AppSettingsSection"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a configuration file that provides additional settings or overrides the settings specified in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_appSettings" name="appSettings" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个配置文件，提供额外的设置或重写中指定的设置<xref uid="langword_csharp_appSettings" name="appSettings" href=""></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: A configuration file that provides additional settings or overrides the settings specified in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_appSettings" name="appSettings" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 提供额外的设置或重写中指定的设置的配置文件<xref uid="langword_csharp_appSettings" name="appSettings" href=""></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of key/value pairs that contains application settings.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含应用程序设置的键/值对的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of key/value pairs that contains the application settings from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 包含配置文件的应用程序设置的键/值对的集合。
